All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public class StringWriterExt
extends java.io.StringWriter

Extends upon StringWriter to add writeln().
Created: 2005

Author:
Kenneth Pierce
